meanings.sent1: She renotifies her friends about the party date change.
meanings.sent2: He renotifies the team about the meeting time.
meanings.sent3: The phone renotifies her of the missed call.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock renotifies him to wake up for work.
meanings.sent5: The reminder app renotifies users of upcoming events.

meanings.sent1: The school renotifies parents about the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent2: The company renotifies employees of the new policy changes.
meanings.sent3: The cat renotifies its owner with a loud meow for attention.
meanings.sent4: The thunder renotifies the sleeping dog to bark.
meanings.sent5: The doorbell renotifies the homeowner of a visitor.
